author: Peter Stubley, Peter Stubley
title: Coronavirus: China reports no new deaths for first time since pandemic began
description: Wuhan quarantine set to be lifted after no further cases in Hubei province
content:
China has reported no new deaths from coronavirus for the first time since it began issuing daily briefings on the outbreak more than two months ago.
In its latest update, the countrys health ministry said there were 32 confirmed cases and 12 suspected cases… [+3028 chars]
